metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19308 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
In text_to_glyphs in sushi-font-widget.c in gnome-font-viewer 3.34.0, there is a NULL pointer dereference while parsing a TTF font file that lacks a name section (due to a g_strconcat call that returns NULL).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19308` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gnome-font-viewer - 3.34.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gnome-font-viewer package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.34.0-2').
gnome-sushi package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
